field_errors.physical_gift_card_invalid_code: The code of the physical gift card is not valid.
field_errors.payment_gateway_not_in_test_mode: is not configured for test commands.This store cannot accept actual orders or actual payments.

payment_errors.generic_error: There was a problem processing your payment.Try again or use another payment method.
payment_errors.rejected_transaction: Your payment has been declined.Try again or use another payment method.
payment_errors.credit_card_processing: Your payment cannot be processed for technical reasons.Try again in a few minutes or use another payment method.
payment_errors.order_total_changed: Your order total has changed.Refresh your cart and try again.
payment_errors.payment_processing: Your payment cannot be processed for technical reasons.Try again or use another payment method.
payment_errors.paypal_zero_amount: You cannot use PayPal for orders of% {amount}.Confirm the accuracy of your order and proceed to checkout without PayPal.
payment_errors.paypal_invalid_token: PayPal was not available.Try again or use another payment option.
payment_errors.pay_later_failed: An error occurred while processing your payment with Pay Later.Choose another payment method and try again.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_failed: Your payment details could not be verified.Try again or use another payment method.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_throttled: Too many tries; please wait before trying again
payment_errors.subscription_agreement_blank: To purchase a subscription, your payment information must be recorded.To continue, confirm that you accept or remove subscriptions from your order.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_failed_duplicate: The 3D Secure authentication of the credit card failed because another is already in progress.
payment_errors.insufficient_funds: Your payment was declined due to insufficient funds.Try again or use another payment method.

fraud_payment_errors.address_mismatch: The name and street number do not match the postal code.

payment_errors.payment_processing_no_retry: Your payment cannot be processed for technical reasons.Please try another payment method.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your cart has been updated and the previous shipping rates are not valid.Select a new rate.
shipping_errors.shipping_method_not_available: Your cart has been updated, and the items you added cannot be shipped to your address.Remove the items to complete your order.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: It is not possible to ship this order to the address you entered.Check that all the fields for your address have been filled in correctly, then try again.
shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Some items in your cart cannot be shipped to the address you entered.Check that all the fields for your address have been filled in correctly, then try again.

shipping_method_not_available_updated.one: The item you added cannot be shipped to your location.Please delete it to be able to pay, or contact the store.
shipping_method_not_available_updated.other: It is not possible to ship at least one of the items you added to your location.Please delete it (s) to be able to pay, or contact the store.

processing.you_will_receive_confirmation: We are currently receiving a large number of orders.You should receive a confirmation by email or SMS shortly.If you do not receive it in the next hour, please let us know.

wait.long: You will receive an email as soon as your order has been processed.There is currently a large volume of orders.
